[ C ] a combination of medical problems that shows the existence of a particular disease or mental condition: Early diagnosis of the syndrome is difficult, but it is important to begin treatment as soon as possible.
[ U ] used in the names of various illnesses: irritable bowel syndrome
[ C ] a type of negative behaviour or mental state that is typical of a person in a particular situation: They said that uninsured-motorist syndrome was a chronic condition in the city. The development of new wind farms was slowed by "not in my backyard" syndrome among locals.
